<!-- GOOGLE SHEET BACKEND ENDPOINT --> <!-- Replace with your Apps Script URL --> <script> const API_URL = "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxZxUDKYnVGr4KTasfbRC2-vgCqJCU0CjXYDdTp0bSa0q34zxdZhTXk4jsx6uybsk1VwQ/exec"; </script> <style> body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background: #f2f6ff; padding: 20px; } .nav-tabs { display: flex; margin-bottom: 20px; background: white; border-radius: 20px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); } .nav-tabs button { flex: 1; padding: 14px; border: none; background: #e7efff; cursor: pointer; font-size: 17px; border-right: 1px solid #d9e4ff; transition: 0.2s; } .nav-tabs button:last-child { border-right: none; } .nav-tabs button.active { background: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; color: #0066ff; border-bottom: 3px solid #0066ff; } .tab-content { background: #ffffff; padding: 22px; border-radius: 16px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); } input, select, textarea { width: 100%; padding: 12px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; border-radius: 12px; border: 1px solid #cbd7ff; background: #f7faff; } button.primary { background: #0066ff; color: white; padding: 12px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 12px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 16px; } button.primary:hover { background: #004dcc; } </style> <div class="nav-tabs"> <button class="active" onclick="showTab('reg', event)">Registration</button> <button onclick="showTab('patient', event)">Patient Details</button> <button onclick="showTab('consent', event)">Consent</button> <button onclick="showTab('upload', event)">Upload Documents</button> <button onclick="showTab('payment', event)">Payment</button> </div> <!-- TAB 1 --> <div id="reg" class="tab-content"> <h3>Registration</h3> <form id="regForm">
<label>Name</label>
<input id="name" required>
<label>Email</label>
<input id="email" type="email" required>
<label>Phone</label>
<input id="phone" type="text" required>
<button class="primary" type="button" onclick="nextTab('regForm')">Continue</button>
</form> </div> <!-- TAB 2 --> <div id="patient" class="tab-content" style="display:none"> <h3>Patient Details</h3> <form id="patientForm">
<label>Age</label>
<input id="age" type="number" required>
<label>Sex</label>
<select id="sex" required>
<option value="">Select</option> <option>Male</option> <option>Female</option> <option>Other</option> </select>
<label>Symptoms</label>
<textarea id="symptoms" rows="4" required></textarea>
<label>Diagnosis</label>
<textarea id="diagnosis" rows="4"></textarea>
<button class="primary" type="button" onclick="nextTab('patientForm')">Continue</button>
</form> </div> <!-- TAB 3 --> <div id="consent" class="tab-content" style="display:none"> <h3>Consent</h3> <p>Please accept the consent to continue.</p>
<label><input id="agree" type="checkbox" required> I agree to the terms</label>
<br><br>
<label>Digital Signature</label>
<input id="signature" required>
<button class="primary" type="button" onclick="nextTab('consentForm')">Continue</button>
</div> <!-- TAB 4 --> <div id="upload" class="tab-content" style="display:none"> <h3>Upload Documents</h3> <input id="files" type="file" multiple accept=".pdf,.jpg,.png"> <p>Files are stored temporarily. Final storage uses Google Drive or S3.</p>
<button class="primary" type="button" onclick="nextTab('uploadForm')">Continue</button>
</div> <!-- TAB 5 --> <div id="payment" class="tab-content" style="display:none"> <h3>Payment</h3> <p>Service fee: â‚¹999</p> <button class="primary" onclick="submitAll()">Submit</button> </div> <script> // TAB SWITCHING function showTab(tabId, evt) { document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content').forEach(c => c.style.display = 'none'); document.getElementById(tabId).style.display = 'block'; document.querySelectorAll('.nav-tabs button').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active')); evt.target.classList.add('active'); } // VALIDATION + AUTOSAVE function nextTab(formId) { let form = document.getElementById(formId); let inputs = form.querySelectorAll("input, select, textarea"); for (let i of inputs) { if (i.hasAttribute("required") && !i.value) { alert("Please fill all required fields"); return; } } // auto save to local storage inputs.forEach(i => localStorage.setItem(i.id, i.value)); // move to next tab const buttons = document.querySelectorAll(".nav-tabs button"); for (let i = 0; i < buttons.length; i++) { if (buttons[i].classList.contains("active")) { buttons[i + 1].click(); break; } } } // LOAD AUTO-SAVED FIELDS window.onload = function() { document.querySelectorAll("input, textarea, select").forEach(i => { if (localStorage.getItem(i.id)) { i.value = localStorage.getItem(i.id); } }); } // SUBMIT TO GOOGLE SHEETS async function submitAll() { const data = { name: localStorage.getItem("name"), email: localStorage.getItem("email"), phone: localStorage.getItem("phone"), age: localStorage.getItem("age"), sex: localStorage.getItem("sex"), symptoms: localStorage.getItem("symptoms"), diagnosis: localStorage.getItem("diagnosis"), signature: localStorage.getItem("signature"), }; const res = await fetch(API_URL, { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(data), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }); let out = await res.text(); alert("Submitted successfully: " + out); } </script>
